title: Football Oreo Cookie Review: Oreo Oration
description:
Just in time for the Super Bowl, it's the Football Oreo. Is it a star QB or a bench warmer? Find out in the Oreo Oration review!

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Leave your review of today's cookie as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] what's up everybody Welcome to Oreo oration I'm Greg Miller and while you weren't calling your mother let me tell you the fine people at Oreo were making endless variations to milk's favorite cookie so every Wednesday and Friday I tear open in a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories if you like that like this video then subscribe to my Channel today we're reviewing football Oreos that's right ladies and gentlemen they actually made these These are the official cookie of the NCAA that's nice to know I'm glad Penn State has a cookie um here's the thing they're obviously just traditional Oreos but will that affect the taste the fact there's a different cream there's all sorts of stuff we're about to find out as you know every Oreo oration begins with the patented first look oh well these don't look that great like you got you got they're lumpy here in the line you got some brakes over here you're not a fan of the brakes up here too I don't know let's get a

first look oh well these don't look that great like you got you got they're lumpy here in the line you got some brakes over here you're not a fan of the brakes up here too I don't know let's get a smell it's got the it's got the Oreo smell I mean again this is just the more your average Oreo is that's what they want you to think let's pull it out take a look there you go you got the one side there looks like that then we're going to flip it over here what do we got this lick the competition Oreo huh what do they think of next putting little messages on Oreos I tell you what then back to football um that's First Look obviously from a first look standpoint these are adorable yeah you're having a Super Bowl party you're having an NCAA party you're watching your Missouri Tigers over there you know your friends bring over pasta salad somebody brings a case of beer you're you're like hey guess what everybody limited edition Nabisco treats made up to look like Oreos let's see how they taste

know your friends bring over pasta salad somebody brings a case of beer you're you're like hey guess what everybody limited edition Nabisco treats made up to look like Oreos let's see how they taste mhm okay there's I know it's going to sound crazy but I eat a lot of Oreos The Taste itself is off from just about a bit of a regular Oreo because it is a different texture on top right you're not getting that normal chocolate cookie taste you're not getting the indentations little designs it's a flat cookie it actually is changing the taste of this normal Oreo still really good though I like the taste I would definitely eat these again at every one of my football parties let's see how they pair with milk obviously the biggest part of an Oreos they say there you go we'll use our patented Oreo oration three dunk technique give me one of these one two three oh interesting too this one says touchdown they say different things they're not all the same presentation going up there first look

oration three dunk technique give me one of these one two three oh interesting too this one says touchdown they say different things they're not all the same presentation going up there first look Dynamite let's see here chocolate cookies we all know sucking in that moisture of the milk keeping it there being a bit soggier I contend that they are a bit thicker just by a bit than your normal Oreo so there's actually there's still a little bit of stiffness in there when you bite down still delicious still recommended let's get to twisting this is going to be interesting we got a weird thing here twisting an Oreo big part ah see that's what you get split you we're not getting the perfect circumference we give give it another test here oh this one's got a guy throwing it well just adorable these cookies are oh my goodness twist it again see we get ah I got a good break this is the first ever Oreo oration going to best of three here game three will it twist fine no split again but pretty

weeks here are they better than a fudge creme they are better than a fudge crem they more going for him a lot of this is personality presentation we're going to go 95 for football Oreos tying Berry burst ice cream Oreos for the number one spot at Oreo orentation that's big news ladies and gentlemen I want you to let that sink in but more importantly I want to know what you think of how the cookie crumbled for football Oreos please leave your video review as a video response to this video then share it with your friends subscribe to my YouTube channel here's the big question though are there other aors out there I'm missing oror is Oreos that's how I call them sometimes are there other Oreos out there that I'm missing let me know in the comments below so I can get them on the show I'll be back every Wednesday and Friday until I run out of cookies to review but until then keep on dunking [Music]
